modName: Real Dragon Fighting Music - Metal Version
summary: Try out a new way to fight dragons! These songs will give you inspiration.
descriptionHtml:
===================================================
Real Dragon Fighting Music (Jan 24, 2012)
===================================================

This mod replaces the songs of the dragon battles with:

Rhapsody of Fire - Emerald Sword
Dio - Killing the Dragon
Judas Priest - Screaming for Vengeance

================================================
Installation/Uninstallation
================================================

Just copy files provided in the folder of version you want to your own data folder
(should be something like \"<steam_directory>\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\").

To Uninstall, simply remove the files you have copied.


================================================
Compatibility
================================================

Should be compatibile with any mods except, of course, those changing 
the same files as mine.

This is my first Mod, I hope you like it!
author: KReeves
